nodes.text: The Crystal Fountain of Bela Vistal was a site that was created shortly after the founding of Bela Vistal on Corellia. At that time, the inhabitants transplanted a crystal geyser from the Agrilat Region to the center of their town, which attracted all visitors from its small lake. It rose like a jagged rock where it appeared completely black, with dark rose and green veins, and water falling down its sides in smooth curtains that gave a soft relaxing sound.
